snippet: Rosalyn Ng, who testified in State Supreme Court in Manhattan at the trial of two men charged with gang assault, said she and her husband feared for their lives when motorcyclists surrounded them.
abstract: Rosalyn Ng, passenger in SUV that was attacked by gang of motorcyclists on West Side Highway in 2013, testifies at trial of Robert Sims and Wojciech Braszczok; says she and her husband Alexian Lien feared for their lives as well as their 2-year-old daughter's when they ran over one biker in attempt to flee gang.
lead_paragraph: Rosalyn Ng, who testified in State Supreme Court in Manhattan at the trial of two men charged with gang assault, said she and her husband feared for their lives when motorcyclists surrounded them.

headline.main: S.U.V. Driver’s Wife on Attack by Bikers: ‘We Needed to Get Out of There’
headline.print_headline: S.U.V. Driver’s Wife Testifies About Encounter With Bikers
